backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining product types, access control, storage maps, and adminâ€‘only product seeding and insertion functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product records to new ones by adding external ID fields while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/artifacts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the artifacts directory is committed.
frontend/docs/LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_SMOKE_CHEC: Guide for verifying a live deployment and ensuring the frontend communicates correctly with the backend canister.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Detailed instructions for packaging the PWA as a Trusted Web Activity and publishing it to the Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring colors, radii, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint defining metadata, PWA manifest links, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/env.json: Deployment configuration file containing backend canister ID and network settings to be filled during deployment.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, theme colors, and shortcuts for the bajya's market app.
frontend/public/offline.html: Static offline fallback page with styling and a retry button for when the app has no network connection.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch handling with special rules for env.json and backend API calls.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-aab-release.s: Shell script that builds a signed TWA release AAB using Bubblewrap and a provided keystore for Play Store submission.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-debug.sh: Shell script that builds a debug APK from the TWA project and copies it to an artifacts folder for testing.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-release.s: Shell script that builds a signed TWA release APK using Bubblewrap and a user-provided keystore.
frontend/scripts/twa-init.sh: Script that initializes a Bubblewrap TWA project using the live PWA manifest and user-specified package details.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that sets up routing, registers the service worker, and runs a backend connectivity smoke check.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Empty placeholder file intended for backend canister interface definitions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Modal dialog wrapping the product form for creating or editing a product.
Form for creating or editing products including validation, image upload, and submission logic.
Displays a product table with edit, delete, and stock toggle actions, including empty-state UI handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShopi: Provides inputs and actions to test Shopify API credentials and sync products, with status and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorState: React component displaying detailed UI explaining configuration errors related to env.json and backend connectivity.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, price, stock status, and navigation to product details.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Shows a PWA install button or fallback instructions based on browser install prompt availability.
Displays a banner when a service worker update is available and allows refreshing to apply it.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the store footer with branding, links, and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Provides the site header with navigation, auth-based admin link, PWA install prompt, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Handles overall page layout with header, footer, config checks, and PWA update banner.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Defines the app slug and basic metadata like name and tagline.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads and validates runtime env configuration, ensuring valid canister IDs and creating actors with the correct settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity, reloading dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvConfig.ts: Loads environment configuration via loadConfig and exposes loading and error state for UI gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity loading, and DelegationIdentity validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to check whether the current caller is an admin, based on the active actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Defines product-related queries and mutations (CRUD, stock toggle, seed) using the backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopifySync.ts: React hook that fetches Shopify products, maps them to backend input format, and triggers a bulk upsert via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Defines a custom ConfigurationError class for config-related exceptions.
frontend/src/lib/shopifyStorefront.ts: Implements Shopify Storefront API client utilities for building URLs, testing connections, and fetching product data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard handling authentication, admin checks, and product management UI including create/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing a hero section, features, and featured products fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page offering navigation back to home or product listings.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view that loads a product by ID, handles loading/errors, and displays full product info.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays all products with search, sorting, loading skeletons, and error handling using data from useProducts.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, logs status, and dispatches events for update readiness and activation.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File into a base64 data URL using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeSmokeCheck.ts: Runs a non-blocking backend connectivity check by loading config and fetching products, logging errors without throwing.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Maps various error types to user-friendly messages, including Shopify-specific and backend errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, features, issues, and Shopify sync-related development context.
